attributes.action: Provide freedom letters to all Military Personal who served in NI.
attributes.background: Military Personal are to be prosecuted for carrying out Government orders in Northern Ireland. Members of the IRA who carried out terrorist attacks were given freedom letters which make them immune to prosecution. The same should now be given to all Military personal who served in Northern Ireland.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it refers to a case which is active in the UK courts. We can't publish petitions about active cases because there's a risk that doing so might prejudice a fair trial.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/165069
